product_name: CHANELN°1 DE CHANEL REVITALIZING EYE SERUM Smooths - Restores - Refreshes
summary: SummaryA refillable serum that smooths and restores the look of skin, boosts vitality and helps protect the delicate eye area. The patent-pending* rotating and cooling applicator offers a gentle massage for a wide-awake appearance. The comprehensive gel formula also leaves eyebrows looking fuller.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsN°1 DE CHANEL REVITALIZING EYE SERUM is infused with Red Camellia Extract, which targets the 5 signs of aging and helps defend skin against the damaging effects of pollution.Camellia Yeast Extract helps strengthen barrier function for enhanced hydration and protection.A 3D complex addresses the 3 dimensions of youthful-looking eyes by minimizing the appearance of under-eye puffiness, dark circles and stress lines.Azalea yeast extract thickens the look of eyebrows.*Patent pending in Europe, the United States, China, Japan and South KoreaItem 2627470How To UseDot the serum around the entire eye area. Use the applicator to smooth across the upper eyelid, then smooth around the outer corner. For the under-eye area, start at the outer corner and smooth toward the temple, working closer to the inner corner with each stroke. Repeat all gestures 3 times. Smooth upward on the frown lines, followed by the eyebrows, moving from the inner edges to the tips.As part of the N°1 DE CHANEL line's eco-responsible approach, N°1 DE CHANEL REVITALIZING EYE SERUM can be refilled as many times as desired, limiting its carbon footprint. Simply keep the applicator from the original bottle and insert it into each refill.IngredientsCamellia Japonica Flower Water, Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Propanediol, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Squalane, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Faex (Yeast Extract), Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Oil, Camellia Japonica Flower Extract, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Lauroyl Lysine, Silica, Hydrogenated Canola Oil, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Arginine, Maltooligosyl Glucoside, Escin, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Chlorphenesin, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Maltodextrin, Acmella Oleracea Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Carbomer, Adenosine, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Canola Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lactic Acid, Phytic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Citrate, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, BS000431A.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dot the serum around the entire eye area. Use the applicator to smooth across the upper eyelid, then smooth around the outer corner. For the under-eye area, start at the outer corner and smooth toward the temple, working closer to the inner corner with each stroke. Repeat all gestures 3 times. Smooth upward on the frown lines, followed by the eyebrows, moving from the inner edges to the tips.As part of the N°1 DE CHANEL line's eco-responsible approach, N°1 DE CHANEL REVITALIZING EYE SERUM can be refilled as many times as desired, limiting its carbon footprint. Simply keep the applicator from the original bottle and insert it into each refill.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Pricey, not results yet, but it goes on smooth and I like the applicator.
